# oxc/no-async-await <Badge type="info" text="Restriction" />

<div class="rule-meta">
</div>

### What it does

Disallows the use of async/await.

### Example

```javascript
async function foo() {
  await bar();
  return baz();
}
```

- [Rule Source](https://github.com/oxc-project/oxc/blob/55744fd9775a032ea83215dadc77a6bff3e2a87d/crates/oxc_linter/src/rules/oxc/no_async_await.rs)
